about.name: Marco Tignanelli
about.paragraph:
I got into programming with a web development course on Udemy, I professionalized with the full-stack bootcamp at SoyHenry, and now I learn the development side on my own while studying engineering and business at college.
I'm good at finding information, problem solving and communication. I like to learn, teach, the color blue and tangerines. When I play volleyball, I play as a middle blocker or setter.
